<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const badges = document.querySelectorAll('.listing-category');

    badges.forEach(badge => {
      badge.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
        // Stop the click from triggering the project card link
        e.stopPropagation();
        e.preventDefault();

        // Use textContent instead of innerText to ignore CSS uppercase styling
        const category = badge.textContent.trim();
        
        // Redirect to the projects page with the correct casing
        window.location.href = '/projects/#category=' + encodeURIComponent(category);
      });
    });
  });
</script>
